channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tech leaders respond to the rapid rise of DeepSeek
item.description: Marc Andreessen, Yann LeCunn and Mark Zuckerberg have all penned what appear to be responses to the Chinese open source model's ascent.

item.title: Promise and Perils of Using AI for Hiring: Guard Against Data Bias
item.description: By AI Trends Staff While AI in hiring is now widely used for writing job descriptions, screening candidates, and automating interviews, it poses a ris...

item.title: PickNik Robotics releases MoveIt Pro 7 with 3 core improvements
item.description: PickNik said it made strides in its three core pillars: rapid development, hardware-agnostic design, and intelligent runtime decisions. The post PickN...

item.title: Target joins Walmart in pulling back on DEI. But this big retailer and its shareholders are staying the course.
item.description: Target said that it was ending its diversity, equity and inclusion goals as it tries to align itself with an “evolving external landscape.”

item.title: Ati Motors brings in $20M to expand presence in the U.S., APAC
item.description: Ati Motors said it tripled its order book in the fourth quarter of 2024 with the addition of nine industry-leading clients. The post Ati Motors brings...

item.title: Trump says there are bigger China threats than TikTok. Here’s where he could be going wrong.
item.description: President Trump this week said “TikTok is largely about kids” and there are bigger threats. China hawks aren’t convinced.

item.title: Corporate tax cuts don’t boost the economy — despite what many investors believe
item.description: Raising corporate taxes — not cutting them — frequently delivers faster economic growth.

item.title: OpenAI launches Operator—an agent that can use a computer for you
item.description: After weeks of buzz, OpenAI has released Operator, its first AI agent. Operator is a web app that can carry out simple online tasks in a browser, such...

item.title: Gaming comedy Mythic Quest Season 4 debuts on January 29 on Apple TV+
item.description: Season 4 of a TV show is not something I write about very often, given my focus is video games. But Season 4 of Mythic Quest is another matter.

item.title: Predictive Maintenance Proving Out as Successful AI Use Case

item.title: How a top Chinese AI model overcame US sanctions
item.description: The AI community is abuzz over DeepSeek R1, a new open-source reasoning model. The model was developed by the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which claim...

item.title: The US withdrawal from the WHO will hurt us all

item.title: LG acquires majority stake in Bear Robotics
item.description: As part of this strategic move, LG Electronics will integrate its commercial robot business with Bear Robotics. The post LG acquires majority stake in...

item.title: Trump tariff talk is heating up on Wall Street, signaling a rocky road ahead for investors
item.description: S&P 500 companies’ mentions of tariffs on earnings calls have surged, according to Citi Research.

item.title: Y Combinator’s hottest startup, Origami Agents, secures $2M seed round to supercharge sales teams with AI
item.description: Y Combinator's fastest-growing startup Origami Agents raised $2M to build AI research tools that help sales teams find perfect customers.

item.title: OpenAI: Extending model ‘thinking time’ helps combat emerging cyber vulnerabilities
item.description: OpenAI used its own o1-preview and o1-mini models to test whether additional inference time compute protected against various attacks.

item.title: 10 technologies to avoid when building a robot
item.description: Poor choices can lead to costly setbacks, reliability issues, or future-proofing problems. OLogic shares tips on how to make better design choices. Th...

item.title: ‘My retirement is going to be a disaster’: I’m 59 and have $45,000 in my 401(k). I earn $72,000. Am I doomed?
item.description: “My student loans are burying me.”

item.title: Why everyone in AI is freaking out about DeepSeek
item.description: DeepSeek has a free website and mobile app even for U.S. users with an R1-powered chatbot interface similar to OpenAI's ChatGPT.
